DataElement.preferredName: Patient Healthcare Activity Facility Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator to determine eligibility for clinical trial participation for questions related to the patient's healthcare at a facility as outlined in the study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Healthcare Activity Facility Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The actions of prevention, treatment, and management of illness and the preservation of mental and physical well-being through the services offered by the medical and allied health professions._Services and space and equipment provided for a particular purpose; a building or place that provides a particular service or is used for a particular industry._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Healthcare Activity Facility Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: The actions of prevention, treatment, and management of illness and the preservation of mental and physical well-being through the services offered by the medical and allied health professions.:Services and space and equipment provided for a particular purpose; a building or place that provides a particular service or is used for a particular industry.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The actions of prevention, treatment, and management of illness and the preservation of mental and physical well-being through the services offered by the medical and allied health professions.
Services and space and equipment provided for a particular purpose; a building or place that provides a particular service or is used for a particular industry.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does the patient intend to re
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient intend to receive their care or monitoring at an NCORP community cancer site?

ReferenceDocuments.name: EAQ171CD - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient intend to receive their care on receiving their cancer care or monitoring at an NCORP community cancer site?

ReferenceDocuments.name: EAQ162CD
ReferenceDocuments.description: Will the patient receive treatment at an outside facility throughout the duration of the trial?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient intend to receive their care or monitoring at one of the NCORP practices?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient confirm that they intend to receive their care or monitoring at one of the participating NCORP practices?
